stepTitle: Let f be a function of the form f(t) $$=$$ $$K b^t$$ where K and $$b$$ are constants with $$b$$ > $$1$$. Any quantity which is modelled by such a function (with $$t$$ representing time) is said to experience natural growth. If $$f(1)=6$$ and $$f(3)=24$$, determine the values of K and $$b$$.
